name: Candy World Quest: Donut Toss Challenge
name_original: Candy World Quest: Donut Toss Challenge
description:
A delicious and incredibly fun social game, unlike anything you've ever seen!

Candy World Quest has a unique and extremely fun gameplay, for those who are tired of always seeing the same social games for their smartphones.
If you already played enough Angry Birds you're ready to face the donut tossing challenge. If you haven’t, that's your chance to practice your aim!
Hit the right targets on each stage and discover new regions and candies. There are over 50 challenging levels. Play with your friends through facebook!

Features:
• Integration with facebook.
• Daily rewards
• Many stages to play
• Awesome 3D graphics
• Dispute the rankings with your facebook friends.
• Different game modes
• Incredible powerups to use in the most difficult stages

------------------------------------------------------------------------
Join this delicious adventure on Candy World Quest. Chocolates, marshmallows, candy apples, lollipops and various other types of candies and desserts awaits you.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Available languages: English, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, French and German.

Are you already a fan of the game? Be sure to like our facebook page:
facebook.com/LudicSide
developers: Ludic Side Tecnologia da Informacao LTDA
publishers: Ludic Side Tecnologia da Informacao LTDA
